_header: Yet should I here a tower [Ȝete suld I here a-towre]
Subjects: Mark, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Mark (with a Prologue on the Four Evangelists) in the Scottish Legendary — in couplets

CULGg26.First Lines:
ȝete suld I here a towrespek of þe ewangelisteis
                    fowre…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…owte of þis lyfe þat I ma twenebut scame deit &
                    dedly syne
CULGg26.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Barbours des schottischen Nationaldichters Legendensammlung.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 1.114-19.
Metcalfe,  William Musham,
                        ed.  
             Legends of the Saints, in the Scottish dialect of the fourteenth
                century….
             6 pts. in 3 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
         13, 18, 23, 25, 35, 37. Edinburgh, London: Blackwood, 1896: 1.2.236-4.
